pages.text: As I'm sure you've noticed by now, some creatures will drop different items when they die based on whether they were killed by a human. When a human kills a creature, an ancient magic of our world causes the creature to drop what we've dubbed 'experience'. Other special items are usually caused by the presence of a powerful (human) soul.

What if I told you that I found a way to replicate these conditions with but a humble skewer? Unfortunately, it takes... well, a lot. At this point, you're probably comfortable with throwing massive amounts of soulus around, correct? Well, if you insert a $(item)Soul Catalyst$() into the Skewer, the soul will be powerful enough for human drops.
